title: Scarred
description: "...psychologically gripping..." Publishing News Plastic surgeon Peter Freeman is a life-saver to the people who need his skills. Twelve-year-old Annette, hideously burned in an accident depends on Peter not only for her looks, but also for her life. Mark, a neurotic young man with a minor facial scar, sees Peter as the one person with the power to mend his misfortunes. When Mark's requests for more and more surgery are refused, his obsession takes a chilling turn.
author: Monica Dickens
